readable.title: 3218861747_5c5c547b66
readable.content: A man in a green shirt is jumping a ramp on his skateboard . A man is skating on a vert ramp A man on a half pipe doing a skateboard trick . A skateboarder is doing a trick in the air with his skateboard on a red ramp while people stand around looking . A skateboarder is riding on a red ramp by the ocean .
